website_summaries.verdict: One of the biggest backpacks on the market with many stylish color options.
pros: Load spring shoulder straps and padded air mesh back panel
Several  zippered pockets for organizing all your gear
Nice price for such a huge backpack
cons: Stitches may give out when placed under too much stress

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack ever!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack holds a ton of school supplies. The "load spring" on the shoulder straps really help to save my child's back when the backpack is packed with heavy supplies. The shoulder straps have great cushioning, as does the back of the pack. My son used the exact same pack (different color) last year and it made it through the entire year of holding heavy school supplies, being thrown around, and even dragged on the ground a bit. He's using the same pack again this year! This is why I bought this one for my daughter. I'm sure it will hold up just as well. I would recommend this pack to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Small but roomy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! It's small yet deep enough to carry everything I need. I like the fact it has 2 separate compartments. The main compartment has two separate partitions for a laptop and other small items like a tablet against your back while still having a space to put thing in that compartment. The smaller compartment has a holder for 3 pens plus a lanyard for your keys and a little mesh pocket for change/small items. It also has 2 mesh water bottle holders ( I use one for my water bottle and one for my iPhone). It's a great backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: So many compartments! So many pouches and pockets!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter, in high school, loves this backpack. It seems like the pockets and pouches are unending. There are so many compartments and they are a great size!! She says it's comfortable, which is good, because with her daily work, it is about 24 pounds. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: High quality and durable.
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the quality of this backpack. The material seems very durable. The amount of space in the bag is great. Offering a variety of compartments. Arrived on time and as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: I needed a huge bag, but man, this bag is HUGE.
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong -- I love this bag. It has everything I need and the color (I got the hot pink one) is gorgeous and just as advertised. But it is a HUGE bag in the sense that it is very deep, quite deeper than I was expecting. So rest assured that you can pack everything but the kitchen sink into it. But if you are looking for a traditional sized backpack I'd recommend something else.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Adidas
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. We carried this all over the islands and on our cruise. Husband now carries it to work. Great price for what you get. Well made and lots of compartments for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: I Love this Backpack but..........
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is great so far. My only complaint is that the opening of the small zippered pocket on the front of the backpack is too small. The opening is not big enough to really see in to, so when I am looking for a specific pen, or an eraser, I usually have to pull everything out until I find what I am looking for, and then put everything back which kind of sucks. Other than the opening for the smaller pocket needing to be bigger, I love this backpack.
customer_reviews.author: JMac

customer_reviews.title: Adidas poor quality product & worse customer service
customer_reviews.text: My son got this backpack for the 2018-19 school year and it started to rip a couple months in and got progressively worse. It tore on the inside so he could still carry it without worrying about appearance. I contacted adidas customer service in November (as directed on my purchase details page through amazon), and they've yet to help us resolve our issue. Poor customer service through adidas. I will not purchase an adidas product on amazon again. I purchase on Amazon for their customer service but this was unusual as it told me to contact adidas directly. Next time I'll be getting a Jansport!
customer_reviews.author: Green and Blue

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it's authentic, already ripped.
customer_reviews.text: Not completely sure this is authentic. It feels a bit cheaper than I'm used to for Adidas bags. One of the internal linings is already ripping, but most of the bag is fairly nice. It works for my needs, but just a heads up.
customer_reviews.author: G.

customer_reviews.title: Fake Adidas back packs
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying an Adidas backpack. I paid the Adidas price. I received a bootleg back pack. I only found that out because it was delivered yesterday, my daughter used it today and it ripped. I had to go out to the store to get a new one and that show I found out. Otherwise I would of never known 🤦‍♀️.I would suggest anyone else who has bought this check yours. I'm pretty sure you'll find you have been scammed. Amazon is looking into it.
customer_reviews.author: tlc

customer_reviews.title: Not made for heavier cargo.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good bag - for light cargo (i.e. clothes) - but unfortunately we've bought 2 for my daughter and they both ripped at the shoulder strap. The shock absorber elastics ripped both times on both purchases. It was a bag bought for school books so maybe it is not made for that kind of cargo. Nonetheless, it shouldn't have ripped in the same place on both brand new bags. We are a big Adidas family but looks like we may have found the company's weakest department; book bags.
customer_reviews.author: Rikai

customer_reviews.title: It works and I'm looking forward to her using it next year.
customer_reviews.text: So far so great we bought this for my daughter's seventh grade year she has a giant binder so we really needed to upgrade to a bigger backpack and this really did what we needed it has a nice design so she likes how it looks and it is very sturdy it has not unraveled it has not torn. She's not extremely hard on her backpacks butshe's also not delicately setting it down so I would say that's a good testament to the backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Shawntelle Bevins

customer_reviews.title: He doesn't like to have to go to his locker between classes ...
customer_reviews.text: My son needed a big bookbag to carry all of his high school books. He doesn't like to have to go to his locker between classes so he needed to carry everything. He is a big, tall kid and this backback works perfectly for him. And the black looks really nice for a guy. Seems to be really sturdy with good sewing and strong materials.
customer_reviews.author: Beth L. Ruhkamp

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This Adidas back pack is perfect. It's so roomy with many different compartments to hold a variety of items. I purchased a solid white one last summer while on a trip and began using it all the time to go to ballgames and quick trips. I like to use backpacks when traveling on planes as my "one personal item." Well, when my daughter left for college, we somehow forgot to get her a new backpack. I told her she could "borrow" mine. She loved it so much and didn't want to give it back, so I ordered myself a new one!
customer_reviews.author: rachpres

customer_reviews.title: Spacious, functional, and durable
customer_reviews.text: The main compartment is large enough for a 3" binder plus other books/supplies and a protective sleeve for a laptop or tablet. There are functional pockets for extras including 2 mesh pockets on the side for water bottles. A small felt-lined, zippered compartment at the top for a phone keeps it protected and accessible. The straps are sturdy & comfortable and the zippers are smooth. The bright color is fun while the black bottom is great since it would show dirt/wear if it was the color.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie A

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just HAD TO HAVE an Adidas backpack this year when she started school. I got on amazon, searched Adidas backpack, and bam...this one came up. I thought the colors would be perfect for her...and they are! My daughter is tough on everything she has...especially backpacks. This one is still kicking and we’re all the way to Christmas break now! I’m pretty impressed!! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Inside Ripsaa
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this backpack was overpriced on Amazon. The bag came new with Adidas tags that had the backpack valued at a much lower cost. Secondly, I've been using this for school, for less than a month and the mesh pouch inside is ripped and now, the entire inside of the backpack is ripped through. A hole large enough for my hand to go through is unacceptable. So disappointed. I'll be sticking with Northface from now on, and Amazon has just lost a customer.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Burge

customer_reviews.title: Nice but weight from books is a problem
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted this for her 7th grade year at school. Has held up well until a few weeks of use. Due to lockers not being available for use she has to carry everything in the backpack. So the seam along where strap connects at the top is starting to unravel.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Davis

customer_reviews.title: Best School Bag Ever
customer_reviews.text: We have three boys and we have been buying the same Adidas bags for school ever since they were in elementary. Each had one for elementary school. Then each got a new one for middle school. And now a new one for high school. Extremely durable. Places for everything. Lots of colors to choose from. Hands down the best back pack for school. (In elementary I would have their names embroidered on them. ). They are much too cool for that now.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bigger backpack that would fit my chunky old laptop and this one was perfect! There's lots of pockets and it was more spacious than I anticipated. I've taken it to school and traveling. I would even replace my gym bag with this backpack. It's so functional. I love it. The color is super cute too! I get compliments on it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley H

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This has been used for 8 months. It has held up well. It is large and can fit in many items. The only concern is the zipper gets caught on the outside fabric frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: I really like the style, it looks very nice and it's spacious. but the material is cheap, very fine plastic-ish, also the inner layer is already torn. im pretty careful with backpacks, but this is too fine and fragile. I'm scared it's going to tear apart once I have more than 2 books or notebooks in it. I don't know if I can return it now that its torn apart or not?!
customer_reviews.author: Bahar

customer_reviews.title: Good Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Had this for 5 years, and it is pretty good except I had to throw it away due to it accumulating mold on it in the last 2 months. Not sure if it’s due to where it was stored or not . Good backpack and would have lasted longer if it did not have mold on it. Overall great backpack, and can fit basically everything a college kid would need .
customer_reviews.author: hanna

customer_reviews.title: Great for high school or college back pack.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, large, well constructed bag. Ordered for my high school age daughter who carries many text books and laptop in her bag. Plenty of room but not so large that it looks like you are going camping for a week. It would be really large for a grade school age child,(unless they were really tall for their age.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very large durable bag.
customer_reviews.text: We had a difficult time finding a book bag large enough to fit all of my daughters textbooks in....three book bags later we found this one. It’s the only backpack that has withstood 6th grade. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Simpson Family

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack!!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite backpacks I’ve ever purchased for any of my kids. The size is great. It fits so much. The straps are very comfortable. I love the color scheme of this particular one that I bought. Girly, but not too much. I’d definitely buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: JML810

customer_reviews.title: Fits everything
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter for school. She keeps all of her books in it all the time. I can't believe she can carry it with all the weight. Strap ripped after 8 months but impressed considering the abuse it takes
customer_reviews.author: thomas mcneil

customer_reviews.title: Great For School!
customer_reviews.text: My high schooler loves it! It Carrie's everything he needs, including his laptop with room to add more things when he needs to. It's also easier to carry with the weight distribution and the shoulder straps are very comfortable without damaging skin from the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable. Perfect for the student with a lot of books.
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old daughter is rough on her backpacks. However, this bag is very sturdy and comfortable. Perfect for a student with a lot of books to carry. The straps are more comfortable than most backpacks out there. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Lining is delicate it seems
customer_reviews.text: I bought my daughter this backpack twice. First one inside lining ripped due to all her books/computer for school. Her & a teacher did sew it back together & it's currently holding up going into school year #2 but I do have one for backup just in case...
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Klein

customer_reviews.title: So much room
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a personal item on a flight to Las Vegas. It is so incredibly light. I packed it good and still felt like I had so much room left over and it didn't kill my back at all. It also was able to be squished under the airplane seat.
customer_reviews.author: Emily McKeon

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack, fits a lot of books, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this backpack for my son in high school. I liked that it was black, which he likes, but had the two red strips not he back so he could identify his backpack in amongst his friend's. He said that actually helped! Any positive feedback from a teenager is a good thing as we moms know ;)
customer_reviews.author: Naturegirl09

customer_reviews.title: Strap tearing 40 days in, not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: One of the straps has already started to rip, less than 40 days old. Not sure about quality here, if I could return it I would, but looks like there's no longer an option to do so. Would expect a backpack to hold up much better than that. Definitely won't be ordering this type again.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for college. I am taking Chemistry, Biology, and Sociology this semester and all my books, notebooks, and binders fit with some room. I’m a bad student because I carry it all at once but the backpack can handle it. The straps aren’t pinching my shoulders and the back of the pack sits nicely on my back with no pain. Very comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Smith

customer_reviews.title: Organization vs Zipper
customer_reviews.text: The backpack has been relatively well. I enjoy the organization it provides especially for college students. The only issue I have with thee backpack is that the zippers tend to get caught on the lining and break therefore making it impossible to zip up one's backpack. So if you can manage not getting the zipper caught then this is the backpack for you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 10 year old. They have to carry a laptop back and forth to school, so this works great. Has its own cushioned pocket. Son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura2183

customer_reviews.title: great back pack
customer_reviews.text: Mys on loves it. Addida Back packs last very long. Has a lot of space. My son fits his chrome book, gym clothes, 3 ring binder and other school materials in the same back pack. No need for several bags.
customer_reviews.author: Maria A.

customer_reviews.title: Very well made backpack. Love to have deeper bottle holder on the side.
customer_reviews.text: Holds lots of school stuffs for 8th grader boy. Only complain he has that net to hold water bottle on the side is too shallow. He has Hydro Flask 20oz bottle, and will not hold, so need to keep it inside.
customer_reviews.author: Greenninjya

customer_reviews.title: Middle Schooler Approved
customer_reviews.text: My middle schooler loves this back pack. Says it’s super comfy with all her heavy books. As well as stretchy, think padded shoulder straps. Thank Goodness bc I bought it just for the colors and size! Mom Win. Haha
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: XL and colorful backpack
customer_reviews.text: Tremendous backpack for my daughter. I have sold many backpacks through the years of working in the Sporting Goods business and I am very impressed by this one. Very large to hold books for college, great and unique colorful look. Made by the great German Adidas company.
customer_reviews.author: Jolt

customer_reviews.title: Great durable backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Durable simple and stylish black backpack. I use this to carry heavy textbooks and a laptop and it works greater. The bottom of the backpack is not as stiff as other backpacks, but I am satisfied with all the pockets and the waterproof material it is made of. Would recommend this to anyone, especially students/teachers.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Great space!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my niece, it's even better looking in person. Love the material and nice and roomy, that's why she wanted it for space.
customer_reviews.author: TheRealPatriot

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 14 year old son. He loves it! This is his second adidas backpack and he is very happy with it. The colors are fabulous. He uses it everyday
customer_reviews.author: A.C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect backpack!!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old son LOVES this backpack!!! Its the perfect size for him to have all of his school things and lunchbox. Definitly a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Maurer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: After doing quite a bit of research, I ordered two of the Adidas Excel III backpacks for my kids starting high school. We have now had them 2.5 years (purchased Aug. 2017) and I will say my kids have USED these backpacks. They are still in fantastic shape and both kids are grateful for how easy they are to carry. 100% recommended.
customer_reviews.author: K.H.

customer_reviews.title: She says it's very comfortable to carry and that the shoulder pads are what ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter lives this backpack! It has 2 big compartments and it is so roomy. Being a middle-schooler, her old backpack was literally bursting at the seams. This one carries all of her books, notebooks and supplies (over 20lbs worth!) with room to spare. She says it's very comfortable to carry and that the shoulder pads are what helps most. Definitely worth the price paid!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Looks OK and does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: This backpack looks OK and does what it is supposed to do, but it does not appear as sturdy and durable as some other backpacks that I have had such as ones by Swiss Gear. The price is OK, but if you are planning to use this for several years I would recommend spending another few dollars and going with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Nevias

customer_reviews.title: Light, great travel backpack
customer_reviews.text: I used this at Chichen Itza. This backpack does have a laptop sleeve but its not a lot of protection, which was exactly what I was looking for. Too many new backpacks have built in full on ballistic protection for a laptop and it takes a lot of space and adds weight. This has mild protection, but that leaves a ton of space for other stuff (water bottles, umbrella, extra clothes, food, etc).
customer_reviews.author: Burleson

customer_reviews.title: Super Spacious
customer_reviews.text: This backpack works great for my 6th and 8th grader! It is THE biggest backpack I have found. It fits their trapper keeper, laptop and lunchbox nicely. It also is strong enough and hasn't ripped from everything that gets put into it! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: christy berghorst

customer_reviews.title: Great amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was hoping for !! Haha I needed a bag big enough to carry four huge books and my laptop with room for tons of pens and supplies and this did it perfectly and the sleeeves are super comfortable and the zippers are amazing quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Bronx Bombers

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Holds all my daughters books and school supplies. Great quality, cute colors and great price!
customer_reviews.author: MICHELE ARANA

customer_reviews.title: Met all my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this book bag for months, to use for college, and it’s still holding up. It’s big enough to use for just about anything.
customer_reviews.author: Chaela

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this backpack for high school. It has a lot of zippers for different compartments. I recommend for any person that needs a big not small backpack for school.
customer_reviews.author: John Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Nice large size, Durable, and stylish! Bought for my 13 year old son for school that has his whole 8 periods of stuff in there and everything fits! I buy him an Addidas backpack every year because I know it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: P Kimble

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I got it as a college backpack it’s great just wish it expanded a little more and helped distribute weight more
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Update: All three of my kids used this back pack for school last year. All three will be using the same back pack again this year! Yay, for not having to spend the money again! Best backpack I've ever purchased! Sturdy and the colors are great! Lots of room for my kids 7 classes and enough room to spare for work out clothing!
customer_reviews.author: Prime Addict

customer_reviews.title: Roomy
customer_reviews.text: Backpack has a ton of room in it. Daughter uses it for college and carries her laptop and all her books in it.
customer_reviews.author: bdubs67

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!
customer_reviews.text: 2nd purchase of this brand and style of backpack. Solidly made! The first could have lasted longer than the 2 years my middle school aged son used it, but he wanted a new one for high school. He says its comfy and holds a ton of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old uses this for school. He likes a bigger back pack with lots of pockets. This has been very durable and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: We love these backpacks and have owned several. They have ample room, but aren't too big. The quality lasts for years, even under daily use!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Hole after a month
customer_reviews.text: This backpack looks great. My older son has this same book bag but different color. The one we ordered from Amazon got a hole in the seam of the pocket of the backpack a month into school being in session. My middle schooler does carry a lot of books but I expected it to last longer than a cheap backpack since my older son has had his for 2 years with little wear and tear
customer_reviews.author: schlengmon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter in high school. It is usually stuffed to the max and probably weighs more than her, yet it hasn't torn or even shown any signs of wear since August 2016. She'll be taking it on to college!
customer_reviews.author: HappyMom o'3

customer_reviews.title: College student approved!
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my son (college student). He loves it! Perfect for school a d travel.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughter. She picked it out and she loves it. Says it's very durable and big enough for all her books
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok at best
customer_reviews.text: The lining on the shoulder straps tore pretty quickly as did some of the inner lining. Shape holds up, but it’s not super durable. I don’t carry heavy things either.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Perfect backpack for everything. Love the colors and style. I really like that it’s comfortable and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: CutEpie

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for price
customer_reviews.text: After three months of use by my middle schooler the straps are fraying. Also would have liked more pockets on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: RedRobyn

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke
customer_reviews.text: After 5 months of use, the strap broke. Considering the price, it should have lasted a lot longer. Not very happy.
customer_reviews.author: tami

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this backpack! She just started 6th grade and had lots of supplies to turn in on the first day. She said it was well supported on her back and it's sturdy. It is a great product for traveling, school, or hiking. Would buy another one if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lorissa P.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!!!!! No durability !!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for my friends and she is using it for about a month. As you can see in the picture, one strap is torn and the other one is also damaged!! My friend only put one notebook in her backpack so this didn't happen because of extra weight!! NO DURABILITY!!!! Dont buy!!! Really cheap material!!! Worse backpack I saw ever!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Setare

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy, durable & well made!
customer_reviews.text: This is GREAT! Very roomy...very durable. I was looking for a roomy bag for my son for school (he has so many binders). I am very pleased and I will definitely remember this style of bag for future backpacks! Very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: Frances West Redmond Cook

customer_reviews.title: Durable product.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two in the past and my kids love all compartments and durable.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for just about anything
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for college, and i love it. Its very durable for all my stuff. I carry about 3 college books, laptop, notebook, and folder and everything in there is sturdy. The laptop holder is surrounded in a soft material so there's no way to scratch your computer. the colors are very vibrant,. i purchased the green and pink. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really liked her bookbag and had plenty of space for all her books.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room
customer_reviews.text: I’m in nursing school so I needed something that could hold a bunch of books and binders. Has plenty of room and sturdy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, not made well
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking bag but it’s ripping on the interior after 3 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, lightweight, not the color I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Cute bookbag... however it was the wrong color that I ordered.. but I kind of like it so I’m keeping it. Wish I had gotten the color I ordered though! Need a bookbag asap since school started today so I’m deciding to keep it. I ordered the grey and turquoise color and got a all over turquoise with peach accents.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great looking backpack
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, quality construction, nice layout, looks great, very fuctional
customer_reviews.author: Ricki M

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is not the same adidas quality I'm used to. Pockets are shallow in the front. I have to carry my wallet with my laptop. It is functional
customer_reviews.author: Laila

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: My middle school aged daughter loves it! It has handled well so far, and can support whatever size load she carries. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: xteror

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Already have this backpack so I know that I love it just wanted a different color option.
customer_reviews.author: Weniki

customer_reviews.title: Nice large, well made back pack.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 14 yr old son who carries EVERYTHING in his backpack.. doesn't use his locker. It's perfect. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: HappyinFlorida

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, comfortable backpack with enough room for all my books.
customer_reviews.author: smile :)

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for my son
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack for my son. He has to carry so many books it's nice for him to have something that helps support his shoulders
customer_reviews.author: Cherrybelle

customer_reviews.title: huge and very strong
customer_reviews.text: huge and very strong, my daughter need to carry a lot of books every day
customer_reviews.author: Victor Santamaria Abrego

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my teenager. He loves it! Sturdy and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Mandie S

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and very pleased so far
customer_reviews.text: It fits all much stuff (laptop, 4 inch binder, folders, planner, tablet, etc) and thensome!!! Very durable and very pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Knze

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend in college. This holds so much weight!!! I think it’s a great value and it’s in style for college students.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Richards

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Utility Bag Priced Right
customer_reviews.text: Very useful and versatile backpack for my Senior boy. Stylish and the price was right too!
customer_reviews.author: AmandainSanAntonio

customer_reviews.title: Tears
customer_reviews.text: Within 8 days of my son using his backpack it started to tear at a seam. Tried calling addidas as directed by amazon. Addidas sent me to another entity. Dont know if I'll ever reach someone to get it replaced under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. The bag is super spacious with enough pockets for all your needs. Way more spacious than I was expecting it to be when I purchased it which is a great plus! The laptop pocket fits most laptops and I was very satisfied with the overall design and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Nms

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3.5 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this backpack for my 5th grade daughter. After 3.5 months, one of the shoulder straps has nearly come off. Disappointed that it needs to be replaced not even half way through the school year.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I got to say, my sister has been using this backpack for 2 years now and it still has not had any issue whats so ever
customer_reviews.author: Syed Imadi

customer_reviews.title: Very very nice color
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty big backpack a lot of room this is my second time buying this backpack just in a different color I got my first one my freshman year of highschool it lasted till now.it is my freshman year of college So I decided to change it up! Great backpack
customer_reviews.author: Nylaflaksa

customer_reviews.title: Broken strap
customer_reviews.text: The strap broke within two weeks of use. I decided to pay up as my daughter started high school and was looking for a backpack to last a few years but was very disappointed that it broke so quickly after buying.
customer_reviews.author: PAMELA MUSE

customer_reviews.title: Large!!
customer_reviews.text: Teenage daughter needed a backpack that actually held all of the stuff she has to carry. This has plenty of room. Padding. Trendy.
customer_reviews.author: Ren625

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and he's been using it for over two years and it still looks as good as new!
customer_reviews.author: JackFrost

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great back pack I got this for my daughter for 6th grade and she loves it! Holding up very nicely I would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for school. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality is lacking
customer_reviews.text: This backpack was poorly sewn on the straps and it soon unraveled.
customer_reviews.author: Meg307

product_meta.title: adidas Excel Backpack
product_meta.description: Head back to school in style. Added bonus - tons of great storage and features to keep you organized all year long. Lifetime warranty - built to last. 4 outside zippered pockets to organize your gear. Soft, lined 15.4 inch computer and tablet pockets. Durable material - built to stand up to wear and tear. XL size to hold everything you need for the day. Load spring shoulder straps to ease the weight. Internal zippered organization pockets. Padded air mesh back panel for total comfort. Two water bottle pockets. Imported
feature_bullets: 4 outside zippered pockets, internal organization, and 15.4 inches computer and tablet pockets
XL size built with durable material : built to stand up to wear and tear
LoadSpring shoulder straps for added comfort
